org.ldaptive.async

Interface AsyncRequest

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JLdapConnection.JLdapAsyncRequest, OpenDJConnection.OpenDJAsyncRequest, UnboundIDConnection.UnboundIDAsyncRequest

    public interface AsyncRequest
    Interface for asynchronous operation requests.
